attributes.action: Thomas Newman Wiltshire Police Force Reforms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to reform the wiltshire police force as it is underfunded and inefficient. I will disclose that as part of the reforms i would change it so that the chief constable of the county could be from the ranks of the wiltshire police force therefore giving them more respect, authority and experience, also they are more likely to care about the situation in their own county.

rejection.details: This is an issue for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
